actions.description: Actions of the card header (Type: CardHeaderActionsObject)

children.description: Content rendered inside the card header (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the card header

hasWrap.description: Flag indicating that header wrapping is enabled

isToggleRightAligned.description: Whether to right-align expandable toggle button

onExpand.description: Callback expandable card (Function: (event: React.MouseEvent, id: string) => void)

selectableActions.description: Selectable actions of the card header (Type: CardHeaderSelectableActionsObject)

toggleButtonProps.description: Additional props for expandable toggle button (Type: any)
